class.name: WwiseRTPC
class.brief_description: This type can be used to set game parameter values to the sound engine.

method.name: get_global_value
method.description: Gets the global value for this RTPC.

method.name: get_value
method.description: Gets the value associated with the [param game_object] for this RTPC.

method.name: set_global_value
method.description: Set the global value for this RTPC.

method.name: set_value
method.description: Sets the value associated with the [param game_object] for this RTPC.
